headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BECKHARD, MADELEINE (NEE KLEIN) OF O'FALLON

snippet: BECKHARD--Madeleine (nee Klein) of O'Fallon, MO (formerly of Dover, NJ and Metz, France), beloved Wife of Ted for 53 years, devoted Mother of Alan (Laura) and Grandmother of Eric and Kathryn. Dear Sister of Chantal (Gerard), Fernand, and Michel. Information "Wien & Son" 1-800-719-7910. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BECKHARD--Madeleine (nee Klein) of O'Fallon, MO (formerly of Dover, NJ and Metz, France), beloved Wife of Ted for 53 years, devoted Mother of Alan (Laura) and Grandmother of Eric and Kathryn. Dear Sister of Chantal (Gerard), Fernand, and Michel. Information "Wien & Son" 1-800-719-7910. 1/3
